title: NewsData.io Aggregator Config
description: Configuration for fetching and summarizing news articles from NewsData.io about oppression, injustice, corruption, and other social issues.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Comma-separated list of keywords to search for (e.g., oppression, injustice, corruption).

category.title: Category
category.description: Category of news to filter by.

country.title: Country
country.description: Two-letter country code for localized news results.

language.title: Language
language.description: Language code of the articles to fetch.

domainOption.title: Source Domain Option
domainOption.description: Choose a domain list or provide a custom domain.

customDomain.title: Custom Domain URL
customDomain.description: If 'custom' is selected above, enter a specific domain (e.g., bbc.com, news24.com).

priorityDomain.title: Priority Domain
priorityDomain.description: Select priority level for domain filtering: Top (10%), Medium (20%), or Low (50%).

useOpenAI.title: Use OpenAI Summarization
useOpenAI.description: Enable summarization via OpenAI (may incur cost).

maxArticles.title: Maximum Articles to Fetch
maxArticles.description: Limit number of articles fetched per run.

debugMode.title: Debug Mode
debugMode.description: If enabled, the actor will save raw API responses to the key-value store for inspection and debugging.

enablePaidTier.title: Enable Paid Tier (Bypass 200 daily request limit)
enablePaidTier.description: If enabled, the actor will continue making API requests after the 200 free daily limit is reached. This assumes you have a paid NewsData.io plan.
